response.original_title: ✦︎ How much does geek squad cost per hour?
response.overview: Geek Squad does not charge an hourly rate for services; instead, they operate on a flat-rate, per-service fee structure. The most direct way to get an exact cost for a repair or setup is to call the support line at 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638. The cost of a service is fixed based on the specific job, like $149.99 for a virus removal or $39.99 for a basic setup, regardless of the time it takes. You will know the exact price upfront when you call 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638. This fixed pricing model eliminates the uncertainty of an hourly bill. For the most accurate quote for your specific repair, use the first line of contact and call 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638.
response.title: ✦︎ How much does geek squad cost per hour?
